#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int cases;
	cin>>cases;
	int Ncoins;
	int weight;
	pair<int,int> coins[510];
	for(int i=0;i<cases;i++){
		cin>>Ncoins>>weight;
		weight = weight-Ncoins;
		cin>>Ncoins;
		int a,b;
		//First - value
		//Second - weight
		int tmp = 1<<30,tval;
		vector<int> dp(weight+5);
		coins[0].first=0;coins[0].second=0;
		for(int j=1;j<=Ncoins;j++){
			cin>>a>>b;
			coins[j].first=a;
			coins[j].second=b;
			tmp = min(tmp, b);
			if(b<=weight){
				dp[b]=a;
			}
			
		}
		for(int j=tmp;j<=weight;j++){
			if(dp[j]==0){continue;}
			for(int k=1;k<=Ncoins;k++){
				int val = dp[j]+coins[k].first;
				int ind = j+coins[k].second;
				if(ind>(weight)){continue;}
				if(dp[ind]>val || dp[ind]==0){
					dp[ind]=val;
				}
			}
		}
		if(!dp[weight]){
			cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		}else{
			cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<dp[weight]<<"."<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
//1 1
//2 1
//11 1
